title: Sign the Check
description:
Alden González joins Buster to discuss Arte Moreno taking offers for the Angels. Then, they discuss the criticism of Moreno for the lack of investment in player development, the failure to run a linear chain of command, and getting too involved with baseball operations. Next, they discuss the need for the next owner to build a team around Mike Trout and Shohei Ohtani. Then, they discuss Fernando Tatís Jr. apologizing after testing for PED use, his upcoming shoulder surgery, and how he can rebuild the trust of the organization and fanbase. Plus, who is the MVP in the American League? Later, Todd Radom hops on for this week’s Phantom Franchise and administers the weekly quiz.
